Package org.smartfrog.sfcore.processcompound

Interface Summary
InterruptHandler Interface used to decouple a Sun-JVM-only class from the rest of the system.
ProcessCompound Defines the process deployment interface.
RootLocator Interface which root locators must implement.
 

Class Summary
DefaultRootLocatorImpl Defines a default root locator for SmartFrog Processes.
InterruptHandlerImpl signal handler for control-C events This is not portable to Non-Sun runtimes (like gcj), because it extends a sun.misc method.
NullInterruptHandler Created 02-Apr-2008 14:29:48
PrimHostDeployerImpl Implements a specialized description deployer.
PrimProcessDeployerImpl Implements a specialized description deployer.
ProcessCompoundImpl Implements deployment behaviour for a process.
SFProcess Access point to the single allowed process compound for a VM.
SFServerSocketFactory A server socket factory that adapts a server socket factory so that we can bind to a particular ip address and can be used to generate RMI server sockets.
StreamGobbler This class redirect InputStream to System.out.
